jobTitle: Senior Data Scientist - Recommendation Algorithms, Experimentation and Analytics
jobDescription: Senior Data Scientist - Recommendation Algorithms, Experimentation and Analytics Los Gatos, CaliforniaScience and AnalyticsPersonalization algorithms at Netflix deliver recommendations to over 125 million subscribers worldwide.
